Detailed Description

Lambert Conformation 2 Standard Parallels map projection.

Author:
v.lakshmanan

LatLon  falseOriginLl,
double  lat_1,
double  lat_2,
Coord  falseOriginLam 
) 

00035                                                               {
00036         this.ellipsoid = ellipsoid;
00037         this.false_origin_ll = falseOriginLl;
00038         this.lat_1 = lat_1;
00039         this.lat_2 = lat_2;
00040         this.false_origin_lam = falseOriginLam;
00041         
00042         this.e = Math.sqrt(ellipsoid.eccsq);
00043         double phi1 = Math.toRadians(this.lat_1);
00044         double phi2 = Math.toRadians(this.lat_2);
00045         double t1 = compute_t(e,phi1);
00046         double t2 = compute_t(e,phi2);
00047         double m1 = compute_m(e,phi1);
00048         double m2 = compute_m(e,phi2);
00049         
00050         this.n = (Math.log(m1) - Math.log(m2))/(Math.log(t1) - Math.log(t2));
00051         this.F = m1 / (n*Math.pow(t1,n));
00052         
00053         double phiF = Math.toRadians(false_origin_ll.getLat());
00054         double tF = compute_t(e, phiF);
00055         this.rF = ellipsoid.eqr * F * Math.pow(tF, n);
00056     }

Coord edu.ou.asgbook.projections.LambertConformal2SP.getLambert ( LatLon  in  )  

00058                                       {
00059         double phi = Math.toRadians(in.getLat());
00060         double t = compute_t(e,phi);
00061         double r = ellipsoid.eqr * F * Math.pow(t,n);
00062         double lambda = Math.toRadians(in.getLon());
00063         double lambdaF = Math.toRadians(false_origin_ll.getLon());
00064         double theta = n * (lambda - lambdaF);
00065         
00066         double easting = false_origin_lam.easting + r * Math.sin(theta);
00067         double northing = false_origin_lam.northing + rF - r * Math.cos(theta);
00068         return new Coord(northing, easting);
00069     }

LatLon edu.ou.asgbook.projections.LambertConformal2SP.getLatLon ( Coord  lam  )  

00071                                        {
00072       double eastdiff = (lam.easting - false_origin_lam.easting);
00073       double northdiff = (lam.northing - false_origin_lam.northing);
00074       double rFnorthdiff = rF - northdiff;
00075       double r = Math.sqrt( eastdiff*eastdiff + rFnorthdiff*rFnorthdiff );
00076       if ( n < 0 ) r = -r;
00077       double t = Math.pow( r / (ellipsoid.eqr*F) , 1/n );
00078       double theta = Math.atan( eastdiff/rFnorthdiff );
00079       
00080       double lon = Math.toDegrees(theta/n) + false_origin_ll.getLon();
00081       
00082       // iterate to find phi
00083       double phi = Math.PI/2 - 2 * Math.atan(t);
00084       double old_phi;
00085       int iter=0;
00086       do{
00087         old_phi = phi;
00088         ++iter;
00089         phi = Math.PI/2 - 2 * Math.atan( t*Math.pow( (1-e*Math.sin(phi))/(1+e*Math.sin(phi)), e/2 ) );
00090       } while ( Math.abs(phi-old_phi) > 0.00001 && iter < 5 );
00091 
00092       double lat = Math.toDegrees(phi);
00093       return new LatLon( lat, lon );
00094     }
